title: Is Unique
description: Implement an algorithm to determine if a string has all unique characters. What if you cannot use additional data structures?
hints: 1. Try a Hash Table; 2. Could a bit vector be useful?; 3. Can you solve it in O(N log N) time?

title: Check Permutation
description: Given two strings, write a method to decide if one is a permutation of the other.
constraints: Case sensitive and whitespace is significant
hints: 1. Could a Hash Table be useful; 2. Strings have same characters but in different orders

title: URLify
description: Write an method to replace all spaces in a string with '%20'.
constraints: You may assume that the string has sufficient space at the end to hold the additional characters and that you are given the true length
hints: 1. You might find you need to know the number of spaces. Can you just count them?

title: Palindrome Permutation
description: Given a string, write a function to check if it is a permutation of a palindrome.
constraints: The palindrome does not need to be limited to dictionary words.
hints: 1. Have you tried a Hash Table?; 2. Can you reduce space usage by using a bit vector?; 3. What characteristic does a palindrome permutation have?

title: One Away
description: Given two strings write a function to check if they are one edit (or zero edit) away
constraints: There are three types of edit: insert, remove, or replace.
hints: 1. Can you do all 3 checks in a single pass?

title: String Compression
description: Implement an method to perform basic string compression using the counts of repeated characters.
constraints: If the compressed string would not become smaller than the original string, return the original string. You can assume the string has only uppercase and lowercase letters.
hints: 1. First compress the string, then check the length.

title: Rotate Matrix
description: Given an image represented by an N×N matrix, where each pixel is 4 bytes, rotate the image by 90 degrees.
constraints: Can you do this in place?
hints: Can you rotate one layer at a time?

title: Zero Matrix
description: Write an algorithm such that if an element in an M×N matrix is 0, its entire row and column are set to 0.

title: String Rotation
description: Given two strings, s1 and s2, check if s2 is a rotation of s1 using only one call to is_substring.
